title: My go to!
content: I'm a big fan of Tampax pearl and always up for a challenge when it come to that time of the month. These have always been my go to for years! I love the variety pack to where you can choose which size is going to work best for you. I pretty much use a whole box a month so they go quick. I prefer the super size. It fits just right. No leakage or odor and can't feel them!. I definitely recommend!
